name: Verra
content:
Verra was a male who worked for the Human crime lord Reegas Vance. Verra served aboard Vance's YT-2400 light freighter Blackstar and he accompanied the starship when it traveled to salvage a derelict ship in the Unknown Regions. However, rival salvagers Khedryn Faal and Marr Idi-Shael boarded the Blackstar and shot Verra in the chest with a blaster, killing him.
Verra was created by the writer Paul S. Kemp and appeared in the short story A Fair Trade, which was published in the 129th edition of the magazine Star Wars Insider in 2011.
